name: 2-[(E)-2-(4-Hydroxy-3-methoxyphenyl)vinyl]-6-methoxy-4-methylphenol
Reason: 2-[(E)-2-(4-hydroxy-3-methoxyphenyl)vinyl]-6-methoxy-4-methylphenol has a melting point influenced by functional groups relative to the base melting point of benzene, which is around 5°C. The hydroxyl group introduces hydrogen bonding potential, raising the melting point by approximately +10°C. The methoxy group introduces additional rigidity and hydrogen bonding potential, contributing approximately +5°C. The vinyl group introduces a flexible chain, which can participate in dipole interactions and raise the melting point by approximately +10°C. The methyl group introduces a bulky side chain, which can hinder the crystal lattice and raise the melting point by approximately +5°C. The hydroxy and methoxy groups can also participate in hydrogen bonding, which can contribute to the melting point.
